ok I followed the instructions on the read me of the crack and made it to work in my macbook, but...

in my pc it gives me bad activation all the time, and nothing worked, the only think that worked was that:

Here is something I dug up for those in trouble with 'bad activation code'...It is a workaround not a full solution but works for me.
1. Find and delete 'Vue 8 xStream.reg'. It was in my c:\Users\All Users\e-onsoftware
2. Open up Device manager and find your network adapter. Right click and pick Disable.
3. Once disabled, run Vue 8. It will pop up the box where you paste in your key and info but don't do anything yet.
4. Run the keygen. It will give you an error about bad mac address if you try to generate a key.
5. Go back to where you deleted 'Vue 8 xStream.reg' and it will be regenerated by the Vue startup.
6. Open that reg file in notepad and copy the random mac address Vue put in the file and paste it into the mac address in the keygen.
7. Generate your key/activation using Vue's random mac address.
8. Paste those into the Vue dialog boxes.
4. Vue should start up. Did for me.
5. Re-enable network adapter if needed. Otherwise, just leave it disabled for the whole time you run Vue.
This is the only thing that worked after much head banging...found that network adapter has to be disabled before starting Vue EVERY time .

correction, on the where is the vue 8 xtream.reg

for me with vista 64 was in programdata/eonsoftware
